content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: black_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 28}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 38}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 43}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 62, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft black_carpet, I need to craft black_dye first. Black_dye can be crafted from an ink_sac which is in slot 28. Therefore, I will move the ink_sac to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 28 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "ink_sac", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 38}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 43}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 62, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the black_dye is in the crafting table, I need to move it to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 8, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 38}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 43}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 62, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft the black_carpet I need to place the white_carpet at slot 17 into the crafting grid. I will start by moving one white_carpet to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: black_carpet
inventory=[{"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "black_dye", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "white_carpet", "quantity": 7, "index": 17}, {"type": "polished_blackstone", "quantity": 51, "index": 32}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 44, "index": 38}, {"type": "mossy_stone_brick_slab", "quantity": 25, "index": 43}, {"type": "lime_dye", "quantity": 62, "index": 44}]
thought: I now need to move another white_carpet to the right of the previous white_carpet. Therefore I will move the white_carpet at slot 17 to slot 2.
Ok
act: move from slot 17 to slot 2 with quantity 1
